## Conditions.IConditionSetDeclOptions.qualifiersToReduce property

If provided, reduces the qualifiers of the condition set by removing qualifiers that are made irrelevant by the filterForContext.

**Signature:**

```typescript
qualifiersToReduce?: ReadonlySet<QualifierName>;
```
